feature_model.name: eLearning ways
feature_model.feature_tree: :r eLearning ways(_r) :o Instructive(_r_1) :o Contructive(_r_1_4) :o Performance Support(_r_1_6) :o distance(_r_2) :o used integrated IS(_r_2_7) :o used VLE(_r_2_8) :o used SN(_r_2_9) :o massive(_r_3) :o based on VLE(_r_3_10) :o based on OER(_r_3_13) :o based on S(_r_3_14)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:_r_1_4 or _r_1_6 or _r_2_7 or _r_2_8 or _r_2_9 or _r_3_10 or _r_3_13 or _r_3_14
